attributes.action: Hold a referendum to establish if parliamentary democracy should continue in UK
attributes.background: Recent events have shown that parliament no longer has the ability to command the confidence of the electorate. Many current members of Parliament do not represent their constituents, putting their own self interests first.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what question you'd like a referendum to ask. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
